page.title: 04HALFORD LODGE
page.content: {Halford Lodge}is an old people's home. It was opened four years ago in 1981. There are thirty flats,about thirty- four people live there.Some of our class went to see the residents.Alan, Karl and Steve spoke to Mr.Shakespeare who is 81years old and was born in Coventry.He went to Radford school and later to Bablake.At school he played games such as football,cricket,marbles and tonweight.He became a provision engineer.Natalie Bell interviewed Margery who comes from Coventry.She went to school in Spon Street.She started school when she was 5years old and left school at 14.first she worked in a bazaar then an office.Lyzanne and Alison spoke to Mrs.Davies who went to South Street School.She remembers World War 1 and playing hopscotch.When she grew up she worked in an aeroplane factory.{(Whitmore Park Junior School)
